title: Science Job Competency Enhancement Course Based on Learning Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge (high school level) and administrative/management work experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment utilizing digital devices (tablets/laptops), evening classes conducted after work hours for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the scientific experiment design process by categorizing it into three stages: problem definition, hypothesis formulation, and verification method selection
Learners can draft experiment reports with over 80% completeness based on peer feedback using collaboration tools
Learners can analyze scientific problem-solving cases to derive two or more practical strategies applicable to workplace environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
